title: Club 1 submits a new player
custom_preconds: DAPM Widget = Domestic Amateur Player Management widget
custom_steps:
Login as domestic club
Fill in required fields on create new widget ( firstname, lastname, DOB, School)
Click Next
Fill in all required fields on the profile
Click Save
custom_expected:
Player Profile is saved and blue success notification appears
[logged in as same club, on the home dashboard] Player appears on the clubs interest list with a status  of Pending Eligible for the upcoming draft year
[logged in as BOC, on the home dashboard] Player appears on the DAPM widget for BOC as Pending Eligible submitted by [Club]

title: Club 1 to MLSB - Hard Match
custom_preconds:
Login as BOC User
In the DAPM Widget, set filter to origin of MLSB and eligible year [current draft year]
Find a player with an origin of MLSB submitted for current draft year
Note his information
custom_steps:
Login as a club
Locate the Create New Widget
Enter a hard match for the MLSB Player noted above (same name, DOB, and school)
Click Next button
custom_expected:
Warning message should pop up that a 100% match has been detected 
Only button available is back

title: Club 1 to MLSB - soft match
custom_preconds:
Login as BOC User
In the DAPM Widget, set filter to origin of MLSB and eligible year [current draft year]
Find a player with an origin of MLSB submitted for current draft year
Note his information
custom_steps:
Login as a club
Locate the Create New Widget
Enter a soft match for the MLSB Player noted above (same name, DOB, but different school)
Click Next button
custom_expected:
Matching popup message shows 70% match
Buttons available are Back or Override

title: BOC can submit a player on behalf of a club and MLSB
custom_steps:
(A)Login as BOC
Fill in required fields on create new widget (first name, last name, DOB, School)
For "Submit on Behalf" field, choose MLSB
Click Next
Fill in all required fields on the profile
Click Save

(B) Repeat all steps but "Submit on behalf" of any club
custom_expected:
(A)BOC is able to successfully submit the player on behalf of MLSB
When viewing the DAPM Widget, Player appears Pending Eligible for current draft year with an origin of MLSB

(B) BOC is able to successfuly submit the player on behalf of Club
When viewing the DAPM WIdget, player appears Pending Eligible for current draft year with an origin of [Club]

title: Club attempts to submit an ineligible player
custom_preconds:
1.1 In order for a player to be eligible for the draft, they must meet the below criteria. If the player does not meet these criteria then the submission for the draft should still be allowed, but the Club or BOC user must explain in the draft eligibility comments why they are submitting this player for the draft. 

1.2  Player must  be one of the following:

                     1.2.1 High School Senior

                     1.2.2 Attending a Junior College

                     1.2.3 Junior or Senior in a 4-year College

                     1.2.4 At least 21 years old 45 days after the last day of the draft
custom_steps:
Login as domestic club
Fill in required fields on create new widget ( firstname, lastname, DOB, School)
Click Next
Fill in all required fields on the profile
Fill in players school level as a "HS Freshman" (or any other criteria that would make the player ineligible)
Click Save
custom_expected:
Error message should pop up asking user to submit draft eligiblity comments
After entering draft eligiblity comments, user can successfully save the player

title: Player submitted must be at least 14 years old
custom_steps:
Login as a cub
Locate the Create New Widget
Enter info for a player who is younger than 14 years old (i.e. DOB 2/20/2011)
Click Next
custom_expected: User should receive error message saying player must be at least 14 years old to be entered into the system.

title: Club can edit players profile after submission except KEY info
custom_steps:
Login as a club
Locate the club interest list widget
Find a player from the club interest list widget who has a status of submitted for the current draft year
Click Edit
custom_expected:
User should NOT be able to edit KEY fields (first name, last name, DOB, School)
User should be able to edit other fields and save the profile

title: Club cannot submit a player for the draft via Create New widget after the deadline has passed
custom_preconds: Using login: systemadmin/avenue924 navigate to the System Admin tab and set the Rule 4 Individual Submissions deadline to be prior to today
custom_steps:
Sign in as a domestic club
In the create new widget, enter a player and hit Next
custom_expected: You should get a blocker message saying draft deadline has passed, only BACK or OK button available

title: Club cannot submit a player for the draft via spreadsheet after deadline passes
custom_preconds: Using login: systemadmin/avenue924 navigate to the System Admin tab and set the Rule 4 Individual Submissions deadline to be prior to today
custom_steps:
Sign in as a domestic club
In the Club Interest List widget, select upload list
custom_expected: You should get a blocker message saying draft deadline has passed and to contact BOC for assistance. The Re-Upload and Download Template buttons will be available.

title: Club can edit and add contact information in players profile
custom_steps:
Login as domestic club
Select a player from Club Interest Widget list
On his profile, select edit
In edit mode make changes to phone number and email  (Edit current ones, add new ones, delete current ones).
Save changes
custom_expected: Club can successfully be able to edit, add and delete emails and phone numbers.

title: Club can mark contact information as primary if multiple entries exist
custom_steps:
Login as domestic club
Select a player from Club Interest Widget list
On his profile, select edit
Add 2 phone numbers (be sure to change the "types" as you cannot have two entries for 1 type, i.e. 2 phone #s for "home")
Add 2 addresses(be sure to change the "types" as you cannot have two entries for 1 type, i.e. 2 addresses for "home")
Add 2 emails (be sure to change the "types" as you cannot have two entries for 1 type, i.e. 2 emails for "home)"
Mark a new phone # as primary, a new address as primary and a new email as primary
CLick Save button
custom_expected: Club can add new contact information and mark it primary and save

title: Player shows up as successfully entered*
custom_steps:
[Logged in as same club]
View the notifications widget, and download the results spreadsheet
*Note that the notifications widget may need to be refreshed to show your spreadsheet
View the club interest list widget and compare to results spreadsheet
custom_expected:
The downloaded excel file should add a results column with a status for each player
If the player has a  status of "sucessfully submitted" he should show up on the Club Interest List widget as submitted for current draft year and pending eligible
Ensure that all players who have a result of successfully entered show up on the club interest list widget

title: Spreadsheet contains errors, system will give user error message*
custom_preconds:
Login as a club
Locate club interest list widget, and click Upload button
Click Download template to download sample spreadsheet template
Copy and paste the first row of sample player into multiple Players
CHange the names, DOBs and School info for the players on the sheet (to prevent matching)
Leave a required field blank (DOB or School) for one or more players
Save the file to your computer
custom_steps:
Login as club
Scroll down to "Club Interest List" widget
Click upload list on the bottom right of the widget
Click choose file and choose the file created from pre-steps
(1)Click upload
custom_expected: (1)Blocker error message will appear informing user that required fields are left blank. From this point, user can re-upload or cancel the upload entirely.

title: Improper formatted spreadsheet should show error to user and re-upload option*
custom_preconds:
Login as a club
Locate club interest list widget, and click Upload button
Click Download template to download sample spreadsheet template
Copy and paste the first row of sample player into multiple Players
CHange the names, DOBs and School info for the players on the sheet (to prevent matching)
Ensure that you have one or two fields improperly formatted for one or more players (example- random letters in DOB field)
Save the file to your computer
custom_steps:
Login as club
Scroll down to "Club Interest List" widget
Click upload list on the bottom right of the widget
Click choose file and choose the file created from pre-steps
(1)Click upload
custom_expected:
(1)Blocker error message will appear informing user that spreadsheet is improperly formatted. From this point, user can re-upload or cancel the upload entirely.
User can also export errors or download the template once again

title: Spreadsheet contains players who are not eligible for the draft*
custom_steps:
Login as domestic club
Scroll down to "Club Interest List" widget
Click upload list on the bottom right of the widget
Click choose file and click the spreadsheet which includes the ineligible players
Click upload
Go to notifications widget after successfully uploading player 
Click on Rule 4 Player Upload Complete
custom_expected: Editing Spreadsheet is downloaded and becomes viewable. Under result in the last column states "Error(s) Submitting Player -This player may not be eligible. Please re-submit this player without using the upload feature."

title: Club can assign pre-ranks for players uploaded in spreadsheet*
System should allow input in suffix column*
BOC can mark a player eligible from his profile
custom_steps:
Login as BOC
From the DAPM widget, choose a player for the current year who is pending eligible
Click Edit at the bottom of the page. 
Click the Rule 4 Status drop down and select "Eligible"
Click Save.
custom_expected:
The players R4 status will become saved and updated.
The Player will show as Eligible in the DAPM Widget
The Player will also now get a Draft ID.

title: BOC can update players R4 status from DAPM widget
custom_steps:
Login as BOC
At the DAPM widget, click the box of the desired player
At the bottom of the widget click the R4 status drop down box
Select the desired status update.
custom_expected:
The players R4 status will become saved and updated.
After saving, go onto the players profile and ensure that the R4 status at the top of the page is changed and updated.

title: BOC can update MULTIPLE players R4 statues by selecting players and using dropdown on bottom right of DAPM widget
custom_steps:
Login as BOC
At the DAPM widget, click the boxes of the desired players
At the bottom of the widget click the R4 status drop down box
Select the desired status update.
custom_expected:
All of the selected players R4 status will become saved and updated.
After saving, go onto the players profile and ensure that the R4 status at the top of the page is changed and updated.

title: Club Uploads a consent via selectable players widget
custom_preconds:
Login as a club
Locate selectable players widget
Change the filter on the header to "All Statuses"
Click on the "consents required" column twice to sort to show consent required players at the top of the widget
custom_steps:
[Logged in as same club]
Click Upload next to any player from this set of players
Find a file from your computer (must be word or PDF)
CLick Upload button
custom_expected:
Blue success notification is shown on the bottom right corner
Player now has a 'pending approval' where the upload button used to be on the selectable players widget
Clicking on players name, and viewing the scouting & drafts tab, there will be a paperclip icon which opens the consent you uploaded

title: BOC can approve a consent
custom_steps:
Login as BOC 
Scroll down to "Consent Form Tracking" widget
Find the player you uploaded consent form for in [C52610]
(1)Check off the box to the left, and click Approve
(2)Type in players name in quicksearch and view his profile
custom_expected:
(1)Blue success notification shows in the corner
(2)Players 'scouting and drafts' tab shows approved consent

title: Club Uploads consent via players scouting & drafts tab
custom_preconds:
Login as a club
Locate selectable players widget
Change the filter on the header to "All Statuses"
Click on the "consents required" column once(little arrow on this column must point up) to sort to show consent required players at the top of the widget
custom_steps:
[Logged in as same club]
Click on any of these players names who have an 'upload' button on their consents required column
From the profile, navigate to the 'scouting & drafts' tab
Locate the Rule 4 draft history widget, and find the upload button
Click Upload, choose your word/pdf file and click upload
custom_expected:
Blue success notification at the bottom is shown
The Rule 4 draft history widget now shows "Pending" instead of the upload button

title: BOC Can reject a consent
custom_steps:
Login as BOC 
Scroll down to "Consent Form Tracking" widget
Locate player for who you uploaded consent in [C52611]
(1)Check off the box and click Reject
(2)Type in players name in quicksearch to find the profile
custom_expected:
(1)Grey confirmation modal appears
(2)Player profiles Scouting and Drafts tab now has the upload button again, instead of Pending Approval to allow user to reupload the file

title: BOC uploads a consent via profile
custom_steps:
Click on the "Upload" button from the players profile (scouting & drafts tab)
Choose a file, and click upload
custom_expected: Consent form is successfully uploaded, pending approval.

title: Club can print a scouting report
custom_steps:
Login as club user
Click on Search on Left Nav
In "search for" field, Enter Amateur Player Report
Add Filters Amateur Report Type > Is > Prospect, click add filter
Click Search
From Search results date column, click on any date link to open the report
Click Print Button
custom_expected: A PDF of the report is printed with all data

title: BOC Can add a player to the top 200 widget
custom_steps:
Login as BOC User
Navigate to the DAPM widget and find a MLSB player who is ELigible for the current draft year
Click on his profile, and click Edit
Find the "top 200" checkbox in the header of his profile, mark it off
(1)Click Save
(2)Locate the Top 200 widget
custom_expected:
(1)Player has Top 200 box checked off.
(2)When viewing the Top 200 Widget, this player should appear in the list.

title: BOC Can add a New School
custom_steps:
Login as BOC user
In the create new dropdown, choose School
Fill in required fields, click Next
Fill in required fields, click Submit
*Ensure that the active checkbox is marked off
Once Approve button, appears, click Approve
custom_expected:
School profile is saved.
Once school has been approved, School appears in quicksearch and advanced searches.

title: BOC Can edit a players profile for current draft year
custom_steps:
Login as BOC User
Choose a player from the DAPM widget who is eligible or pending eligible for the current draft year
Click on his profile, and click Edit
Edit any fields from his header 
Edit eligible year to a future year
Click Save
custom_expected:
Profile is updated with the changes you made.
BOC is successfully able to make changes without any error messages.

title: Only BOC user can delete a player current club entered players
custom_steps:
Login as BOC user
Locate the DAPM Widget and click on any player who is pending eligible for current draft year and has a origin of any CLUB
Scroll to the bottom of the profile and view buttons
(1)Click Delete
(2)Click Yes
custom_expected:
(1) Warning message pops up:
You are attempting to delete this player from the system. All of the player's information will be lost and cannot be recovered. Would you like to continue? 
(2) Player is deleted and cannot be found in the system

title: BOC can print a scouting report
custom_steps:
Login as BOC user
Click on Search on Left Nav
In "search for" field, Enter Amateur Player Report
Add Filters "Amateur Report Type > Is > Prospect, click add filter
Click Search
From Search results date column, click on any date link to open the report
Click Print Button
custom_expected: A PDF of the report is printed with all data

title: BOC can edit re-draft profiles
custom_steps:
Login as BOC User
Choose a player from the DAPM widget who has an origin of redraft, draft year=any year within the past 5 years
Click on his profile, and click Edit
Edit any fields on his profile
Click Save
custom_expected:
Profile is updated with the changes you made.
BOC is successfully able to make changes without any error messages.

title: 7248- Player records linked to matches*
custom_steps:
Login as club-hou-ama
In Create New widget, enter a player

Login as club-ari-ama
In Create New widget, enter a soft match to that player

Login as BOC
Update ARI's player to be a hard match to HOU's player
(Note: System should automatically merge these two profiles on Save)

Login as club-atl-ama
In Create New widget, enter a hard match to same player
custom_expected:
User should still be able to view ARI's player as both BOC and ARI
User should still be able to view HOU's player as BOC and HOU

title: MLSB/Re-Draft passed over players should have past year records in profiles*
custom_steps:
Login as BOC
Navigate to advanced search
Search for "Domestic Amateur Player"
Add filter: "Origin" "is" "Major League Scouting Bureau"
Add filter: "Eligible year" "equals" "[previous draft year]"
Search
Select a player with Rule 4 Status of "Passed Over"
Open player's profile and select "edit" at the bottom
On frozen header, updated his eligible  year to "[current year]"
Save changes
custom_expected: The player should now have a new 2016 profile, along with previous 2014 record

title: MLSB to MLSB - any draft year
custom_preconds:
Login as BOC User
Locate the DAPM Widget
Filter the origin to show only origin of MLSB Players, current draft year, status is=pending eligible
Note any players name, DOB and school

Logon as scout admin
In the create new widget, enter a soft match for the player noted
(same name, DOB, different school)
Click next, Override Match Messages and fill in all required fields on the profile
click Submit
click Approve
*Ensure players eligible year is current draft year and player is now pending eligible
custom_steps:
Login as BOC user
Locate the DAPM Widget
(1)Use the filter icon to search for the player by first or last name
(2)Select checkboxes for both players and click merge button on bottom of the widget
(3)Choose one player to save as "master copy" and Click Merge again
(4)Click Override on warning message
custom_expected:
(1)Players will not show matches to one another but show as two separate entries on the DAPM widget
(2)Popup will appear asking user to choose which player to keep as master copy. No option for a BOC copy
(3)BOC will get an overridable warning that they are merging 2 MLSB players with the option to override or cancel
(4)Blue success notification shows on bottom right.Chosen profile is kept in the system, the other one is discarded. Merge is successful.

title: MLSB (Current Year) to Club Entered (Current Year)
custom_preconds:
Login as BOC User
Locate the DAPM Widget
Filter the origin to show only Pending Eligible, current draft year, origin of MLSB
Note any players name, DOB and school

Login as a club1
Fill create new widget with a soft match to player noted above (same name, DOB, diff school)
Click Next, Override match messages
Fill in all required fields
Click Save, override match messages
custom_steps:
Login as BOC
Locate the DAPM Widget
Use the funnel filter to search by last/first name for the player you entered as Club1
From the warnings column, click on the expansion to see matches (player should match to MLSB player from pre steps)
(1)Click Merge button
(2)Click Merge again
(3)Locate player in DAPM Widget
(4)Login as Club1 and search for player by last name in quicksearch
custom_expected:
(1)Merge popup opens, No BOC Copy option (MLSB is the BOC copy by default)
(2)Blue successful merge notification appears on bottom right
(3)The Origin of this profile will display as "MLSB" and no longer show the club profile as a match (club profile is overwritten by MLSB profile)
(3)Only the MLSB profile is viewable, Club version of profile does not exist anymore

title: MLSB to Club Entered (Passed Over from a Previous Year)
custom_preconds:
Login as BOC user
Locate the DAPM Widget
Filter by status=Passed Over, eligible year=previous draft year,Origin=[Club1], 
Note a players full name, DOB and school

Login as scout admin
Enter a soft match in the create new as the player noted above (same name, DOB, diff school), click next
Fill in all required fields, ensure the eligible year is current draft year
Click Submit
Click Approve
*Ensure player is now pending eligible for current draft year. If he is not, edit his profile and save again
custom_steps:
Login as BOC
Locate DAPM Widget
Use the funnel filter icon to filter by [Last Name] and Find the player you submitted as scout admin in pre steps
View his warning column, and click on the (+) sign to expand the matches(player should match to the club1 passed over player from presteps)
Check off the box of the matching player
(1)Click Merge from inside the expansion
(2)Click Merge again
(3)Locate player on DAPM widget
(4)Click on his name to open profile
(5)Click on Scouting & Drafts tab from the profile
custom_expected:
(1)Merge popup opens,There is no BOC Copy option
(2)Blue success notification appears of successful merge and DAPM widget refreshes
(3)The origin will show as MLSB and match warnings will be gone
(4)The profile will have an origin header in profile with a dropdown to show previous passed over club profile
(5)The Rule 4 - Draft History widget hows his current year pending eligible MLSB record and also his previous year passed over CLUB record

title: Club Entered (Current Year) to MLSB (Passed Over from a Previous Year)
custom_preconds:
Login as BOC
Filter the DAPM widget to status is=Passed over, eligible year=previous draft year,show origin=MLSB
Note any players name, DOB and school

Login as a club
Enter a soft match for player noted above in create new widget (same name, DOB, diff school) Click Next
Click Override match warning, fill in all required fields
Click Save, Override match warning once again
Ensure that the player is saved as pending eligible for current draft year
custom_steps:
Login as BOC
Locate the DAPM widget
Filter the widget to find club submitted player from pre-steps
View the warning column which should show a warning %, and click + sign to open the match expansion
(Player submitted by club should match to MLSB passed over player from pre-steps)
Check off the box next to matching MLSB player inside the expansion box
(1)Click Merge
(2)Click Merge again
(3)Locate player on the DAPM Widget once again
(4)Click on player's name to open the profile
(5)Login as a scout admin, and enter players last name in quicksearch bar. Click on his name to open the profile.
custom_expected:
(1)Merge popup appear, No BOC copy option
(2)Blue success notification of successful merge shows and DAPM widget refreshes
(3)The origin remains as the [club] who entered him for current draft year, no longer matches to MLSB passed over player
(4)BOC can see previous year MLSB entry from origin dropdown in the profile header
(5)MLSB will only see previous years profile, cannot see this years entry from the club

title: Club 1 Entered to Club 2 Entered: (Different Clubs - Same Draft Year)
custom_preconds:
Login as BOC User
Locate the DAPM widget
Locate a status=pending eligible for current draft year, origin= [Club1]
Note players name, DOB and school

Sign on as [Club 2]
Locate Create new widget and enter a soft match for player noted above (same name, DOB, diff school)
Click Next
Fill in all required fields, click Save
custom_steps:
Login as BOC
Locate the DAPM Widget
Filter the widget using the funnel icon and typing in players last name to find [Club 1] entered player
Click the + sign on the warning column for this player (player should soft match to Club 2 entered player)
Check off the box next to player inside the expansion
(1)Click Merge
(2)Use radio button to select which player to keep (and make note of it)Click Merge again
(3)View DAPM widget and Filter to find the player you just merged
(4)Click on players name to open the profile
custom_expected:
(1)Merge popup displays, user must choose which to keep as BOC copy
(2)Blue success notification of merge appears and DAPM widget refreshes
(3)Player will now display in the DAPM widget with an origin of MULTIPLE
(4)Player profile will show origin in the header which will have a dropdown to display club1 and club2 entered profiles along with the BOC copy version

title: Club Entered to Multiple with BOC Copy: (Different Clubs - Same Draft Year)
custom_preconds:
Note the player from test case [C58711] who  now has an origin of MULTIPLE

Login as Club 3
Locate create new widget and enter a soft match to the player above (same name, DOB, different school)
Club 3 should NOT see matches to the players entered by Club 1 or Club 2
Click next, fill in all required fields
Ensure the players eligible year is current draft year
Click Save
custom_steps:
Login as BOC user
Locate DAPM widget
Locate the player entered by Club 3 in pre-steps, and view the warning column
Click on the + sign in the warning column to open matching expansion (player should match to the player with MULTIPLE origin from previous case)
Check off checkbox next to players name inside the expansion
(1)Click Merge
(2)Select Club 3 player,Click Merge again
(3)Go back to home dashboard and locate player in DAPM widget again
(4)Click on players name to open the profile
custom_expected:
(1) Merge popup appears showing the two players, one with an origin of MULTIPLE and the other with Club 3 origin
User must select which profile to keep as BOC copy
(2)The previous BOC copy is overwritten with CLub 3 profile
(3)Origin in the DAPM widget shows as MULTIPLE
(4)Player profile has an origin dropdown which allows BOC user to access the BOC copy along with all other club entered versions

title: Club 1 Entered to Club 2 Entered: (Different Clubs - Previous Draft Year)
custom_preconds:
Login as BOC
Locate the DAPM Widget
Filter using  status is=passed over, eligible year=previous draft year,origin= [club1]
Find any player and note his information down

Login as Club 2
Enter a soft match for the player above (same name, DOB, different school)
Click Next, fill in all required fields
Click Save
custom_steps:
Login as BOC
Locate the DAPM widget
Use the funnel filter icon and type in the players last name submitted by Club 2
View the warning column and click + sign to open expansion and view matches (player should match to Club 1 passed over player noted in pre steps)
Check off the checkbox inside the expansion
(1)Click Merge
(2)Click Merge again
(3)Locate player on DAPM widget again
(4)Click on players name to open profile
custom_expected:
(1)Merge popup appears, no option for a BOC copy available
(2)Blue successful notification of merge appears
(3)Player will have an origin of the club that submitted him for current draft year (Club 2) and no longer matches to [Club1] Player
(4)Player will have an origin dropdown in the header of his profile to show previous draft years record from Club 1 (i.e. 2012 NYY)

title: Club 1 Entered to Club 1 Entered: (Same Club - Current Draft Year)
custom_preconds:
Login as BOC
Locate DAPM Widget
Filter to find status is=pending eligible, draft year=current draft year,origin= Club 1 
Choose any player and note his information down

Sign on as club 1
Locate create new widget
Enter a soft match for player noted (same name, DOB but different school)
Click next, and override match messages
Fill in all required fields
Click Save and override match message once again
custom_steps:
Login as BOC
Locate DAPM widget
Use the funnel filter to find player from pre-steps by entering his first or last name
View warnings column, and click on + sign to expand the warnings (both players from pre-steps should match to each other)
Check off the checkbox for the matching player inside the expansion
(1)Click Merge
(2)Select one profile to keep, and click Merge again (note which one you chose to keep, the other will be discarded)
(3)Click Override on warning message
(4)Locate DAPM Widget and filter to find this player once again
custom_expected:
(1)Merge popup appears with the option of which profile to keep. No option for BOC copy in this scenario
(2)BOC receives an overrideable warning message that they are merging 2 players with the same origin for the current year
(3)Blue success notification of merge appears
(4)Player you chose to keep appears in the DAPM widget, the other has been discarded. Player no longer shows a matching warning to the discarded player

title: Club 1 merge to Redraft*
custom_preconds:
Login as BOC
Filter the DAPM widget to show origin=Redraft, status is=[Any], eligible year=[Any]
Note any players name, DOB and school

Login as a club
Enter a soft match for player noted above in create new widget (same name, DOB, diff school) Click Next
Override match warning, fill in all required fields
Ensure that the eligible year is current draft year
Click Save
custom_steps:
Login as BOC
Locate the DAPM widget
Filter the widget to find club submitted player from pre-steps
View the warning column which should show a warning to the Re-draft player and click on the + sign to open expansion
Check off the box next to player
(1)Click Merge
(2)Click Merge again
custom_expected:
(1)No BOC copy option (Club auto saved as primary profile)
(2)Player is successfully merged and players origin on DAPM widget shows as Club 

NOTE: MLSB users will still be able to view the player's profile - but not any of the upcoming draft specific information (such as the new entry in the player's Draft History or the player's Origin for the upcoming year's draft).

title: BOC can “Ignore” a match by clicking ignore button within matching expansion
custom_steps:
Login as BOC
Locate the DAPM Widget (Leave the default filters for "Pending Eligible, current draft year, and no filter for origin")
Locate a [player1] who has a match % on their warning column
Click the + sign to open the match expansion
Select the checkbox inside the expansion for the players match [player2]
(Note player1's info)

(2)Locate [Player1] Player no longer matches to [Player2]

title: Club1 to Club2 hard match with No school should auto merge
custom_preconds:
Login as [Club1]
Locate create new widget and enter a player, for school field "enter no school" from the auto-completer
Fill in required fields and click SAVE


Sign on as [Club 2]
Locate Create new widget and enter a hard match for player noted above (same name, DOB) and "No School"
Click Next, ensure the eligible year is current draft year
Fill in all required fields, click save

(2)Click on players name to open profile
custom_expected:
(1)Player appears in the DAPM widget with an origin of MULTIPLE
(2)Player profile has an origin dropdown which allows BOC to view CLub 1 and Club 2 submitted profiles

title: Player merge retains the player ID who was entered first
custom_steps:
Login as BOC
Scroll down to Domestic Amateur Players widget
Under The Warning column, click the percentage drop down to see the matching profiles
Check the boxes of the matching player(s)
Click Merge
Then Click Merge again when you receive the pop up with the players information  
Override warning
custom_expected: The two players will successfully be merged into one player with one unique player ID. The player who was entered earlier is the one whose Player ID is retained. The discarded player is no longer available in the DAPM Widget.

title: Multiple to Multiple Merge*
MLSB to MLSB - any draft years - soft match
custom_preconds:
Login as BOC
Filter the DAPM widget to find players with origin=MLSB, status=Pending eligible, draft year=current draft year
Find any player and note his information down
custom_steps:
Login as a scout admin
Locate create new widget
Enter a soft match for player noted above (same name, DOB and different school)
(1)Click Next
(2)Click Override and fill in all fields on profile, click Submit
*Ensure the players eligible year is current draft year
(3)Click Approve, override any match messages
(4)Login as BOC and view the DAPM Widget and locate player submitted as scout admin
custom_expected:
(1)User should receive a match warning with option to override or go back
(2)User is taken to profile and can submit the profile
(3)User can approve the profile
(4)Player submitted by scout admin should not match player noted in pre-conditions

title: MLSB (current year) to Club Entered (current year) Hard Match
custom_preconds:
Login as BOC User
Locate the DAPM Widget
Filter the origin to show players with origin of= Club, eligible year=current draft year, status is=pending eligible
Note any players information
custom_steps:
Login as a scout admin
Fill create new widget with a hard match for the player noted above (same name, DOB and school)
Click Next, Fill in all required fields
Ensure eligible year is current draft year
(1)CLick Submit
(2)Click Approve, ensure that the players status is pending eligible for current draft year
(3)Login as BOC and view DAPM widget. Use filter to find the player submitted 
(4)Click on players name to open the profile

(2)Profile is approved status
(3)Player appears with an origin of MLSB. Club entered profile is not visible (since it gets auto merged with the MLSB profile)
(4)Player displays with an origin of MLSB, Club version NOT available in origin

title: MLSB to Club Entered (Passed Over from a Previous Year)

Login as BOC User
Locate the DAPM Widget
Filter the origin to show players with origin of= Club, eligible year=previous draft year, status is=Passed Over
Note any players information
custom_steps:

Click Next
Ensure that the eligible year is current draft year, fill in required fields
(1)Click Submit
(2)Click Approve
(3)Login as BOC again and locate DAPM widget. Use filter to search for scout admin submitted player.
(4)Click on his name to open the profile
custom_expected:

(2)Profile is approved status
(3)Player appears in the DAPM widget with an origin of MLSB, does not match to passed over club player from pre-steps 
(4)System has auto merged the passed over club player and MLSB profile from current year, so origin in players profile has a dropdown with passed over club profile available and MLSB profile available

title: Club entered (Current Year) to MLSB (Passed over from previous year) SOFT match - Resubmit
custom_preconds:
Login as BOC
Locate DAPM widget
Filter by origin=MLSB, draft year=previous draft year, status = passed over
Note players information
*Note that the player must be ONLY MLSB Passed Over. Please open his profile and look at Scouting & Drafts tab - Draft History Widget, and ensure he was not passed over by club at some point. If he was passed over by a club after he was passed over by MLSB, this test case will not work.
custom_steps:
Login as Club1
Locate Create new Widget
Enter a soft match to MLSB player noted from pre-steps (same name, DOB but different school)
(1)Click Next
(2)Click Resubmit for Draft button
(3)Click Save
(4)Login as BOC, locate the Club 1 submitted player in the DAPM widget
(5)Click on players name to view the profile
(6)Click on Players scouting & Drafts Tab and view R4 history widget
custom_expected:
(1)Popup will show user that the player matches to previous year MLSB profile, and allow user to "resubmit" or cancel.
(2)On clicking resubmit for draft, the system will open the passed over MLSB profile in edit mode
(3)Profile is resubmitted, and player is "pending eligible for upcoming draft year
(4)Player appears in the DAPM widget an origin of submitting club
(5)On players profile, the origin dropdown shows current years club profile, also the passed over MLSB profile
(6)Player shows a record for current draft year with origin or Club. Player also shows a record for the previously passed over MLSB record

title: Club 1 to Club 1(Same Club - Diff Draft Year - Resubmit)

Locate DAPM widget and use the filters below
origin =[Club1], status = Passed over, Eligible year =any year within past 5 years

Pick any Player from search results and note his information down
custom_steps:
[Logged in as Club1]
Go back to home dashboard
Locate CreaTe New widget, and enter all the same information as player noted in pre-steps (hardmatch)
Click Next

(2)Click Save

title: Download spreadsheet template
custom_steps:
1. Log in as any club 
2. Locate the Club Interest List 
3. Click Upload List at the bottom of that box 
4. Click Download Template 
5. Open the Template 
6. Go to the Template tab on the spreadsheet
custom_expected: *When performing these test cases, it is easiest to use the one pre-entered player in the template tab and just make changes to the match fields (First name, Last Name, DOB, School) according to the Pre-Steps for the given test case. Just keep the template open, and re-save each time you make changes to the one player. This will be much easier than doing a new spreadsheet and entering new player information each time.

title: Error submitting player
custom_preconds:
[C60997]
Fill in all required fields on the spreadsheet, but leave a required field blank
Save file to your computer
custom_steps:
1. Remain logged in as a Club 
2. At the bottom of the Club Interest List, click the Upload List 
3. Click Choose File, and select a file with missing required fields 
4. Click Upload
custom_expected:
1. Club is logged in 
2. A pop-up with option to Upload and Download Template appears 
3. Able to select a file 
4. An error pop-up appears stating why the submission was unsuccessful

title: Submitted Player
Club entered, then MLSB entered
custom_preconds:
1. Login as Club
2. Locate Club Interest List
3. Click Upload button
4. Click Download template
5. On the Excel template, edit fields for a new player to be uploaded (First Name, Last name, DOB)
6. Save the file to your computer
7. Go back to club interest list widget and click upload
8. Choose file you saved and click Upload, Click OK on confirmation message
9. Refresh the Club interest List widget and player will appear as pending eligible for current draft year for submitting club
custom_steps:
1. Login as MLSB Admin
2. Locate Create new widget and enter a hard match for player entered in pre-steps
3. Click Next
4. Fill in all required fields, click Submit
5. Click Approve
6. Ensure that the player is now pending eligible for current draft year (if he is not pending eligible, edit profile to pending eligible and save)
7. Login as Club from pre-steps
8. Locate the player on the club interest list widget
custom_expected:
1. Logged in as MLSB
2. All create new fields are filled in with the same exact info of the player from pre-steps
3. Profile appears
4. Profile is Submitted
5. Profile is approved
6. Player will be pending eligible, approved status for the current draft year
7. Player will appear on Club Interest List widget as MLSB Entered (No longer has an origin of Club)

title: Club 1 Entered to MLSB Entered (Current draft year) hard match
custom_preconds:
1. Log in as a BOC 
2. In the Domestic Amateur Player Widget, Filter by: Status = Pending Eligible or Eligible, Year = current year, Origin = MLSB 
3. Locate a player with a MLSB origin and note his information 
4. Enter the information for a hard match in the spreadsheet (If one of your soft match criteria is school, be sure to include all fields for the School information to match completely, denoted by two asterisks) 
5. Save
custom_steps:
1. Log in as [Club] 
2. At the bottom of the Club Interest List, click the Upload List 
3. Click Choose File, and select the saved file with Hard match information 
4. Click Upload 
5. Click OK 
6. Refresh the page and locate the Player in the Club Interest List
custom_expected:
1. Club is logged in 
2. A pop-up with option to UPload and Download Template appears 
3. Able to select a file 
4. Pop-up should show submission success with an OK button 
5. Pop-up Should close 
6. Player Should appear with the Submission status as MLSB Entered

custom_steps:

title: System should throw error if user attempts to upload a non-excel file
custom_steps:
Login as a club
Locate the Club Interest list WIdget
Click Upload button
Choose a file from your computer that is not excel (JPG,PDF,etc)
Click Upload

Only options are to Re-Upload or Download Template
